astern Standard Time,

Question:

I don't =
hear most of the files you post, but you hear  them so clearly. The 
only w=
ay to validate what you hear is true, would be to  follow up with 
somethin=
g that you got that actually happened.

Have you  ever heard a message that=
 came true that nobody else heard, 
basically  validating your experience?
=

-Steve
